//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	set ( "SET_CONSOLE_COMMAND", "set cg_damageindicator 0" );
	set ( "SET_PLAYER_CAM_DEATH", "OFF" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_HEALTH", "-1" );
	wait ( 100.000 );
	set ( "SET_CONSOLE_COMMAND", "set cg_damageindicator 1.5" );
	set ( "SET_WORLD_DEATH_PAUSE", "DEFAULT" );
}
